summary: This is an email chain from August 11, 2019, forwarding a request for assistance regarding a crossing inquiry for a person of interest in the Jeffrey Epstein case. The email is sent in the context of the investigation into Epstein's death, which occurred on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; his death on August 10, 2019, is mentioned as the context for the crossing inquiry.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died, prompting an investigation and related inquiries.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 11, 2019, concerning the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
It references a 'crossing inquiry' for a person of interest in the Epstein case.
The email indicates coordination between different agencies (OIG, FBI, OGA) following Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
